Description: Changes cyclic observer mode at runtime.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Normally all players enters observer mode when no respawn points are available. When enabling this entity, players won't respawn on available spawn point until [trigger_respawn](../trigger_respawn) is used (that let mapper control player respawns or disabling them).
Entity to trigger whenever {{ entname }} is triggered. Trigger use-type is 'Toggle'.
Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to change cyclic observer mode. Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can be kill-targeted.
